original_text: Coming out of his mouth is a sharp sword with which to strike down the nations. “He will rule them with an iron scepter.” He treads the winepress of the fury of the wrath of God Almighty.
korean_text: 그의 입에서 예리한 검이 나오니 그것으로 만국을 치겠고 친히 그들을 철장으로 다스리며 또 친히 하나님 곧 전능하신 이의 맹렬한 진노의 포도주 틀을 밟겠고

sentences.original_text: Coming out of his mouth is a sharp sword
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 입에서 나오는 것은 날카로운 검입니다

sentences.original_text: with which to strike down the nations
He will rule them with an iron scepter
of the fury of the wrath of God Almighty
